benchmark.name: mp3decoder
benchmark.description: Partial decoder for MPEG 1/2 Layer 3 audio. This performs the core computation necessary for audio decoding, including applying an antialiasing filter, an inverse DCT, and PCM synthesis. This is not enough to decode an MP3 audio file, however; the front-end decompression stage is not static-rate and not directly expressible in StreamIt.

impl.desc: The .out file is just generated by strc -library -i100. Not checked for correctness. Compile for raw needs extra time
